languages.text: "Если же душа ваша так очерствела, что лишь триумф насилия может смягчить ее шрамы — наслаждайтесь резней грозного Плотояда! Сегодня мы вновь попытаемся убить его!"
"If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill him again!"
languages.original_text: "Если же душа ваша так очерствела, что лишь триумф насилия может смягчить ее шрамы — наслаждайтесь резней грозного Плотояда! Сегодня мы вновь попытаемся убить его!"

traits.locale_text: "If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars — enjoy the massacre of the fearsome carnivore! Today we will try to kill it again!"
"If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill it again!"
"If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill it again!"
"If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill him again!"
"If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill him again!"

languages.text: « Si votre âme est si endurcie que seul le triomphe de la violence peut la satisfaire, venez assister au massacre du terrifiant Dévoreur de chair ! Aujourd'hui, nous essaierons de le tuer à nouveau ! »
languages.original_text: "If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill him again!"

traits.locale_text: « Si votre âme est si endurcie que seul le triomphe de la violence peut la satisfaire, venez assister au massacre du terrifiant Dévoreur de chair ! Aujourd'hui, nous essaierons de le tuer à nouveau ! »

languages.text: “如果你的灵魂真的如此坚韧，只有残暴的胜利才能软化它的伤痕，那就尽情享受血肉吞噬者与可怕的屠杀吧！今天能否有人消灭这头怪物？让我们拭目以待！”
languages.original_text: "If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill him again!"

traits.locale_text: “如果你的灵魂真的如此坚韧，只有残暴的胜利才能软化它的伤痕，那就尽情享受血肉吞噬者与可怕的屠杀吧！今天能否有人消灭这头怪物？让我们拭目以待！”

languages.text: 「お前の魂は硬くなりすぎている。その傷跡を和らげられるのは暴力による勝利だけなのか。それなら恐怖の『肉体喰らい』の負けっぷりを楽しめよ！今日、俺たちは奴をまた殺しにかかるぜ！」
languages.original_text: "If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill him again!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の魂は硬くなりすぎている。その傷跡を和らげられるのは暴力による勝利だけなのか。それなら恐怖の『肉体喰らい』の負けっぷりを楽しめよ！今日、俺たちは奴をまた殺しにかかるぜ！」

languages.text: "Wenn Eure Seele so abgehärtet ist, dass nur der Sieg der Gewalt ihre Narben aufweicht, dann sollte Euch das Massaker des fürchterlichen Fleischfressers sehr gefallen! Heute werden wir wieder versuchen, ihn zu töten!"
languages.original_text: "If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill him again!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Eure Seele so abgehärtet ist, dass nur der Sieg der Gewalt ihre Narben aufweicht, dann sollte Euch das Massaker des fürchterlichen Fleischfressers sehr gefallen! Heute werden wir wieder versuchen, ihn zu töten!"

languages.text: «¡Si tu alma está tan encallecida que el triunfo de la violencia es lo único que puede ablandarla, disfruta de la masacre del temible Embuchador! ¡Hoy intentaremos matarlo otra vez!».
languages.original_text: "If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill him again!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Si tu alma está tan encallecida que el triunfo de la violencia es lo único que puede ablandarla, disfruta de la masacre del temible Embuchador! ¡Hoy intentaremos matarlo otra vez!».

languages.text: "Taşlaşmış ruhunuzun yaralarını yumuşatacak tek şey şiddetin zaferiyse amansız Etobur'un katliamını izlerken gözleriniz bayram etsin! Bugün bir kez daha onu öldürmeyi deneyeceğiz!"
languages.original_text: "If your soul is so hardened that only the triumph of violence can soften its scars, enjoy the massacre of the fearsome Fleshgorger! Today, we will try to kill him again!"

traits.locale_text: "Taşlaşmış ruhunuzun yaralarını yumuşatacak tek şey şiddetin zaferiyse amansız Etobur'un katliamını izlerken gözleriniz bayram etsin! Bugün bir kez daha onu öldürmeyi deneyeceğiz!"
